name: Bloodknife (LD51)
description:
Getting paid to kill space goblins? Easy money for a vampire. So I took the job on Planet D3-AD without asking too many questions. They didn’t tell me that the days on Planet D3-AD are only ten seconds long. Well, I’m already here. Guess I’ll make the most of it… until the sun rises.

Use ranged attacks to defeat the goblin hordes from afar and then rush in to deliver the finishing blow and collect their blood to power up your BLOODKNIFE

CONTROLS

  • Press Shift to Dodge
  • Tap Left Click to Attack
  • Hold Right Click to Aim/Charge your Bloodknife

CREDITS

  • Programmed by Herchey and TomatoLamp
  • Art by TomatoLamp
  • Music and SFX by GibberingTaylor


A game for Ludum Dare 51:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/bloodknife-knife-of-blood
